data.name: Pestilent Hunters
data.detailed_description:
Pestilent Hunter is a roguelike shooter game with various enemies based on the black plague, with various playable characters and various bosses to face off! Create crazy builds with the various artifacts you acquire throughout the game and try not to die for the various enemies that appear with each new scenario.

  • 4 playable characters with different weapons!

  • More than 30 artifacts with different abilities!

  • 4 amazing and difficult bosses!
  • A lot of enemies to kill!
  • And the craziest builds your brain can imagine!
data.about_the_game:

Create crazy builds with the various artifacts you acquire throughout the game and try not to die for the various enemies that appear with each new scenario.

  • And the craziest builds your brain can imagine!
data.short_description: Welcome to Europe, home to one of the most cruel and deadly diseases to ever plague humanity, the plague, the black plague. Join the Pestilent Hunters and you'll have to face a variety of disgusting monsters to try to prevent the end of humanity in this frantic roguelike!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
